name: CAPITAL SANDER, a new 'Free to play' Sandbox MMORPG
blurb: A \u201cFree to Play" online game in a crazy world full of action, eroticism and chaos with a funny touch.

rewards.reward: No Reward
SUPPORTER:  \r\n\r\nAn exclusive desktop wallpaper. Thank you for supporting us in this project. Even a little support is important for us!
DOUBLE SUPPORTER : \r\n\r\nAll the above + Exclusive wallpapers and artworks about the game and the city.

BIG SUPPORTER : 

All the above + Exclusive access to the closed beta and backers forum where you can post your suggestions for the game developers.  Also your name will appear in the credits.
PACK  # 1 = 1 month Premium Account ( Double experience and in-game credits, valued at  10  £ ) and a 20% discount in the game store during that month.
FAN:  All the above + Interactive digital copy of comic \u201cCapital Sander Chronicles Vol.1\u201d  + Choose from 5 outfits for your avatar, unique to 'backers'!
OFFICIAL FAN: \r\nAll the above + Digital Soundtrack Copy + Official T-shirt of the game ( shipping fees not included )

BIG FAN:\r\nAll the above +  PACK  # 2:  3 months Premium Account ( double experience and in-game credits, valued at  \u00a3 30)\r\nand 25% discount  at the game store during those months. * The Premium Account PACKS are not cumulative.
NICK FAN:\r\nAll the above +  You can reserve your username in the game (by order of reception) .
GIFT BUNDLE : \r\nVoucher for 2 x 35\u00a3  pledge. One for you and one to give to whoever you want. Send us the details to whom you have given it to.

GAMER:\r\n ( All of the above rewards except  60 \u00a3 ) +  PACK #3 = 6 months Premium Account (double experience and in-game credits, valued at \u00a3 60) and 30% discount at the game store during those months.  Exclusive access to the Alpha version of the game. * The Premium Account PACKS are not cumulative.

EXCLUSIVE GAMER:
All the above +  
"SUPER BACKER" T-shirt with your Nickname, 
besides the physical version of the official Capital Sander Comic “Capital Sander Chronicles Vol.1” 
( shipping fees not included ) For all pledges over 100£ PACK # 3  is always included.

BRONZE GAMER: \r\nAll the above + \u201cLimited Edition\u201d of   "Capital  Sander Chronicles Vol.1" signed by the Seven Monkeys team! \r\n +  Bronze Key: access to places / missions requiring 5 levels above yours.

SILVER GAMER:
All the above +  An official Capital Sander USB flash drive , with the release version and all the digital material inside!
+ Silver Key allows access to places / missions requiring 10 levels above yours.
* The Keys are not cumulative.

GOLD GAMER:
All the above +  Exclusive role skills  for backers ( a choice between 2 very interesting, You would enjoy ! ). 
In addition, you can design one mission in the game.
(subject to design conditions).
 +  Golden Key allows access to places / missions requiring  15 levels above yours.
* The Keys are not cumulative.
CELEBRITY:\r\nAll the above +  also put the name you want to on a street from Capital Sander.\r\n(subject to design conditions).
All the above +  Get a local / owned house in the game where you can do whatever you want in private  (adult stuff).\r\n(subject to design conditions).
PUBLISHER:\r\nAll the above +  also place a simple publicity poster for a year in game(subject to design conditions).
BIG PUBLISHER:\r\nAll the above + You can also have a maxi poster advertising for a year in game(subject to design conditions)
HISTORICAL:\r\nAll the above + Modeling upscale of a statue in the city, your own image or as you want! (subject to design conditions)
THE SPECIAL ONE: \r\nAll the above ( except others 2000\u00a3 Rewards )  + you will design an unique weapon / object to your taste to use in the game. (subject to design conditions)
FASHIONABLY:\r\nAll the above ( except others 2000\u00a3 Rewards ) +  We will make an exclusive in-game suit  for you (subject to design conditions)
THE COLLECTOR :\r\nAll the above + Includes all 2000\u00a3 rewards

THE PROFFESIONAL:\r\nAll the above + an interesting Course of 3D Modeling and Animation  in our studio.  4 days in the city of Santander, Cantabria, Spain in the months of July  and August  ( Travel and accommodation not included )

PRODUCTION ASSISTANT:\r\nAll the above (minus the animation course)  + and you can also spend  3 days with the development Capital Sander team:  See how we work and touring our region . Includes accommodation in a Hotel and meals . You can bring  a companion too. Come on, holidays in the beautiful city of Santander, Cantabria, Spain. (Not including travel).
